home.welcomeMessage: Welcome to your ultimate learning destination.
home.heroSubtitle: Master university entrance and exit exams with our comprehensive practice tests and AI-powered feedback.
home.feature1Description: Access thousands of practice questions covering all exam topics with detailed explanations.
home.feature2Description: Get instant, personalized feedback to identify your strengths and areas for improvement.
home.feature3Description: All content is created and reviewed by experienced educators and exam specialists.
home.testimonial1Quote: The practice tests helped me understand the exam format perfectly. I scored higher than I ever expected!
home.testimonial2Quote: The detailed explanations after each question really helped me learn from my mistakes.
home.testimonial3Quote: I love how the platform adapts to my learning pace. It's like having a personal tutor!
home.ctaTitle: Ready to Excel in Your Exams?
home.ctaSubtitle: Join thousands of students who have successfully prepared for their exams with our platform.

about.title: About EduPlatform

about.description2: Our platform provides comprehensive practice tests, AI-powered feedback, and personalized learning experiences to ensure students are well-prepared for their academic challenges.
